original_text: When the wicked spring as the grass, and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish; it is that they shall be destroyed for ever:
korean_text: 악인들은 풀 같이 자라고 악을 행하는 자들은 다 흥왕할지라도 영원히 멸망하리이다

sentences.original_text: When the wicked spring as the grass
and when all the workers of iniquity do flourish
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 불의를 행하는 자들이 번성할 때

sentences.original_text: it is that they shall be destroyed for ever
